## {{< iconify game-icons:skills>}} Technical Skills

-   [**Fiber laser**]{.underline}: Design and fabrication of fiber lasers (CW and pulsed), Raman fiber lasers, and amplifiers

-   [**Fiber processing**]{.underline}: stripping, cleaving, splicing, recoating of normal and specialty fibers

-   [**Nonlinear conversion**]{.underline}: Freq. doubling using nonlinear crystals - BBO, LBO, PPLN

-   [**Free-space setups**]{.underline}: pulse shapers, grating filters, beam combiners, collimators, and coupling systems

-   [**Simulations**]{.underline}: fiber lasers, Raman lasers, nonlinear pulse propagation, harmonic generation and free-space optics

-   [**Softwares**]{.underline}: Python, Julia, Mathematica, COMSOL, Zemax
